content.query:
-- Create a stored procedure for storing the scoring script.
CREATE PROCEDURE [ML].[TaxiPredictProcedure]
AS
BEGIN
-- Select input scoring data and assign aliases.
WITH InputData AS
(
    SELECT
        [tipped],
        [paymentType],
        [passengerCount],
        [tripDistance],
        [tripTimeSecs],
        CAST([pickupTimeBin] AS [varchar]) AS [pickupTimeBin]
    FROM [ML].[NYCTaxi]
)
-- Using T-SQL Predict command to score machine learning models. 
SELECT *
FROM PREDICT (MODEL = (SELECT [model] FROM [ML].[models] WHERE [ID] = 'demosynapsest-nyc_taxi-20220313083601-Best:1'),
              DATA = InputData,
              RUNTIME = ONNX) WITH ([variable_out1] [real])
END
GO

-- Execute the above stored procedure.
EXEC [ML].[TaxiPredictProcedure]
